review: Almost perfect. Not sure if its my router or what but sometimes I get some lag/ stuttering when casting a tab. Dropped the casting resolution to the lowest it will go but it still happens. Casting YouTube or Netflix though works great.

review: It didn't arrive in our box and we had to call Amazon about it. We had no packaging label or receipt either, it's unclear if they believed us. Once it arrived it worked great it's really easy to install and it's really small.
